sense.def:
A target
je nekaj, kar poskušamo zadeti z izstrelkom, puščico ali kroglo.

seg.quote: The station was an easy target for an air attack.
My first two shots missed the target.

sense.def:
A target
je tudi oseba ali stvar, ki jo kritiziramo.

seg.quote: He has become the target of furious criticism.

sense.def:
A target
je tudi rezultat, ki ga poskušamo doseči.

seg.quote: It set a target for economic growth in excess of 4% a year.

sense.def:
To be on target
pomeni dobro napredovati, tako da je dosega zastavljenega cilja zelo verjetna.

seg.quote: The latest sales figures are on target.

sense.def:
To target a group of people
ali
to target something at a group of people
pomeni poskušati vplivati na določeno skupino ljudi ali jo prizadeti.

seg.quote: ...targeting markets such as mature drivers and women under thirty.
The scheme is targeted at salaried workers.
